channel.title: Meetups on Enrique Saez
channel.description: Recent content in Meetups on Enrique Saez

item.title: Barcelona Ruby Coding Dojo - February'18
item.description: Yesterday I attended the Barcelona on Rails Meetup. The meetup itself was actually a Dojo and a presentation followed by a discussion around code quality.

item.title: Organizing Hacktoberfest Barcelona - Oct'17
item.description: Hacktoberfest is an event sponsored by GitHub and Digital Ocean to promote new contributions to open source. After talking with Joan, a fellow engineer at Skyscanner we decided to host such an event at Skyscanner's premises: Hacktoberfest Barcelona.

item.title: ProductHunt Madrid - Sept'17
item.description: Today I attended Madrid ProductHunt as I was curious about Transferwise and about the startup scene in Madrid.

item.title: Barcelona Blockchain Meetup - June'17
item.description: Yesterday I attended the Barcelona Blockchain Meetup. My goal was to get a feeling of the developer community in Barcelona around this technology.

item.title: PyconWeb - May'17
item.description: The Pyconweb conference, held in the premises of the Ludwig Maximilian University of Munich, took place during the last weekend of May. The conference aimed to gather people with a common interest for Python-based web development.

item.title: Barcelona AWS Meetup - May'17
item.description: As part of the Skyscanner ambassador group in Barcelona, we support the local software community by helping organize different events. On May 9th the Barcelona AWS meetup was held at the office.

item.title: Madrid Python Meetup - November'16
item.description: Last November I attended the Madrid Python Meetup. Being a regular attendant of Barcelona Python Meetup I was curious about the Python community in Madrid.
